page.title: 02POPULATION
page.content: (Survey- 59% return on all possible) In the last 20 years,6 new estates have been added to the village. Our survey shows that 36% have lived here for less than 5 yrs;39% for between 5 and 10yrs and 25%for more than 10. Only 20 people are native born Many newcomers are retired and this has unbalanced the distribution of age groups.14% are below 11yrs;11% are of secondary or further education age;7% are between18 and 30,whereas 38%are in the 31 to 60 group and 29% are over 60 Nearly half of the sample were born either in the S.E. of England(27%) or in the Midlands (16%). 31% are from elsewhere in Cornwall and a further 10% come from other S.W. counties. In a class of 29 children only 6 were born in Pelynt.
